name: mcp-local-memory
description: Local memory MCP server. Semantic search, context tagging, local SQLite storage. Works offline or with OpenAI for better accuracy.

OPENAI_API_KEY.title: OpenAI API Key (Optional)
OPENAI_API_KEY.description: For better embeddings and automatic fact extraction. Works offline without it. Get key at: https://platform.openai.com/api-keys

CONTEXT_ID.title: Context ID (Optional)
CONTEXT_ID.description: Separate memories by context (e.g., 'work', 'personal'). Defaults to 'default'.

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: Optional. Better embeddings and auto fact extraction

examples.title: Offline Mode (Default)
examples.description: Works completely offline. Downloads ~130MB model on first use.

examples.title: With OpenAI
examples.description: Better embeddings and automatic fact extraction

examples.title: Separate Contexts
examples.description: Use CONTEXT_ID to keep work and personal memories separate

features: Optional OpenAI mode for automatic fact extraction
SQLite storage, all data stays local
